description: Sum{d(i-1)-d(i): d(i)<d(i-1), i=1,...,m}, where Sum{d(i)*3^i: i=0,1,...,m} is base 3 representation of n.
maple: A037844 := proc(n)    a := 0 ;    dgs := convert(n,base,3);    for i from 2 to nops(dgs) do        if op(i,dgs)<op(i-1,dgs) then            a := a-op(i,dgs)+op(i-1,dgs) ;        end if;    end do:    a ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 16 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
